text: If you have an inline output big enough to have a scroll bar, and you put your cursor over it and scroll down, as soon as you hit the bottom, if you're still scrolling, it disappears, making it really hard to see what's on the last few lines of it. Is there any way to disable this?

elements.text: If you have an inline output big enough to have a scroll bar, and you put your cursor over it and scroll down, as soon as you hit the bottom, if you're still scrolling, it disappears, making it really hard to see what's on the last few lines of it. Is there any way to disable this?
